title: Love Island's Theo Campbell hits back at Idris Virgo after he accuses him of FAKING his blindness
text:
Theo Campbell has hit back at another former Love Island contestant who has accused him of faking his recent accident, which left him blind in one eye.

The argument unraveled on Twitter between the two men, after Theo shared a screen-grab of Idris Virgo replying to a fan, saying 'Think it's fake tbh' with regards to Theo's injury.

Theo - who was on Love Island 2017, while Idris featured a year later on the ITV2 show for a very brief period - added to the tweet: 'You missed out the part where you’re telling you're little people I’m lying about my eye... only a idiot like yourself would lie about such a thing.

Theo Campbell has hit back at another former Love Island contestant who has accused him of faking his recent accident, which left him blind in one eye

'And that fact you’re putting our convo on Twitter just proves once again what a BEG you are. BEG BEG BEG such a loser.

'You’re boring. You didn’t get an invite to the reunion because you had 0 personality on the show. Everyone else should, only you shouldn’t.

'And because your a puppet that’s why you won’t get casted again. I duno why you try so hard online to make noise. But carry on its laughable [sic].'

Idris replied to this, posting: 'Who are you again? People only know who you are because of your girlfriend other than that you’re irrelevant. Man had to shoot him self with a cork to get clout [sic].'

Catty: Theo shared a screen-grab of Idris Virgo [pictured] replying to a fan, saying 'Think it's fake tbh' with regards to Theo's injury

Leaked: Theo and Idris got into a public tirade during the social media exchange

Theo lost the sight in his right eye during a freak accident in Ibiza.

He continued to sport his black eye patch as he stepped out with his glamorous girlfriend Kaz Crossley at the Superdrug Presents press event at the Yard Shoreditch in London this week.

Theo, 28, opted for an all black ensemble as he donned a form-fitting black T-shirt with a pair of slouchy tracksuit bottoms and trainers.

Kaz also sported a casual look, donning a dark grey bodycon dress with a stylish cropped blue denim jacket layered over the top.

Stepping out: Theo continued to sport a black eye patch as he stepped out with his glamorous girlfriend Kaz Crossley at the Superdrug Presents press event at the Yard Shoreditch in London on Thursday

Casual: The Love Island star, 28, opted for an all black ensemble as he donned a form-fitting black T-shirt with a pair of slouchy tracksuit bottoms and trainers

Theo appeared on This Morning earlier this month to speak about his ordeal, where he was hit in the eye by a champagne cork which caused it to split in two.

During his description of the gruesome aftermath, Theo also explained that he's had to have seven stitches in his eye and has struggled to adjust having just one working eye, after returning home from Ibiza where the accident took place.

Theo has been ever-optimistic that his sight will one day return, and he revealed to Eamoon and Ruth that he's started to see light again in the injured eye.

Glam: Kaz also sported a casual look, donning a dark grey bodycon dress with a stylish cropped blue denim jacket layered over the top

Edgy: She styled her look with a pair of chunky white lace-up trainers, and toted her belongings in a shiny black leather bag

'I can see light now. It’s like looking through a stained glass window,' he said.

'Everything is a massive blur. Doctor’s don’t like to give you much hope. They said it’ll never be the same again.'

The reality star has been sporting an eyepatch since finally jetting home to the UK, and recently revealed he's taking part in a 10k race to raise money for charity.
